means: 明确的
一定的
肯定
有把握

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"清楚的，明白的，明显的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: apparent, obvious, evident, clear, plain, distinct, definite, manifest
means: apparent ：强调显而易见或一想便知。这个词从动词appear派生而来，故有时含有表面如此而事实上未必的意味。
obvious ：语气较强，指极为明显，有目共睹，无需说明和论证。
evident ：指根据事实成为显然的。
clear ：普通用词，侧重清楚明白。
plain ：普通用词，含义与clear很接近，可通用，但plain着重简单明了，不复杂。
distinct ：较正式用词，指轮廓的清楚或定义、含义的明确，不会弄错。
definite ：语气肯定，着重明白无误，无可怀疑。
manifest ：语义较强，书面用词，强调一目了然，暗示不要任何推论就一清二楚。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"明确的"之意。
means: explicit ： 指清楚明白，毫不含糊其辞，因而无任何理解困难。
definite ： 指对所提到的事的范围及其细节毫无疑问，含有明确和确定界限的意味。
specific ： 强调内容明确，毫不抽象、笼统。
express ： 语气较强，较正式，指不但清楚明确，而且含有直截了当和有力等的意思。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均含"无疑的，确信的"之意。
means: sure ： 侧重主观上对某事确信无疑。
certain与sure同义，但语气比sure强，着重指有确切理由或不容置疑的证据所支持的确信。
definite ： 指已毫无怀疑的余地。
positive ： 语气强烈，指对自己的看法或作的结论的正确性有不可动摇的信念。

sentence.Network_en: Her Royal Highness has definite views about most things.
sentence.Network_cn: 女王陛下对大多数事情都有明确的观点。

sentence.Network_en: When you came away you made a definite effort to mix.
sentence.Network_cn: 你离开时一定要努力和大家搞好关系。

sentence.Network_en: Mary is very definite about this.

新概念英语第二册单词总汇_英语网 ... return n.,vt.,vi. 报答，返回 definitely ad. 一定，肯定地 reveal vt. 揭露，显示，泄露.
脑胶质瘤门诊_天涯医院_天涯论坛 ... 6. Memory loss 记忆丧失 Definition 定义 Brain Tumor 脑肿瘤.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin definitus 'defined, set within limits', past participle of definire (see define)

entry.def: If something such as a decision or an arrangement is definite, it is firm and clear, and unlikely to be changed.

example.ex: It's too soon to give a definite answer...
example.tran: 要给出一个明确的答复，现在还为时过早。

example.ex: Her Royal Highness has definite views about most things...
example.tran: 女王陛下对大多数事情都有明确的观点。

entry.def: Definite evidence or information is true, rather than being someone's opinion or guess.

example.ex: We didn't have any definite proof...
example.tran: 我们没有任何确实的证据。

example.ex: If you have any definite news of my husband, please let me know...
example.tran: 如果有我丈夫的确切消息，请一定告诉我。

entry.def: You use definite to emphasize the strength of your opinion or belief.

example.ex: There has already been a definite improvement...

entry.def: Someone who is definite behaves or talks in a firm, confident way.

example.ex: Mary is very definite about this.

entry.def: A definite shape or colour is clear and noticeable.

example.ex: Studying his face in the bathroom mirror he wished he had more definite features.
example.tran: 看着浴室镜子中的脸，他真希望自己的五官能够更分明一些。

sentences.sentence: "a definite statement of the terms of the will"
"definite restrictions on the sale of alcohol"
"it is definite that they have won"

stems_affixes.type_exp: =limit,boundary,end 表示"结束,范围,界限,限制"

fin结束,范围,界限,限制+al……的→adj.最后的,最终的

in无+finite[adj.有限的;[数]有穷的,限定的]→adj.无限的,无穷的 n.无限

in无+finite[adj.有限的;[数]有穷的,限定的]→adj.无限的,无穷的 n.无限
infinite[adj.无限的,无穷的 n.无限]+itude状态→infinitude无限,无穷数

fin结束,范围,界限,限制+ish表动词→完成;结束[词性变化:表示名词]

Sentence.sentence: Whether digitally interactive ones like Inkling actually take off or not remains to be seen, and we probably won't have a definite answer for the next few years.

A study by Mannaz, a leadership development company, suggests that, while the bully-boy chief executive of old may not have been eradicated completely, there is a definite shift in emphasis towards less tough styles of management – at least in America and Europe.

sentences.en: The doctor is quite definite about Tom having measles.
sentences.cn: 医生十分肯定汤姆得了麻疹。

sentences.en: It's definite that he will come to help us.

jushi.english: It was a definite mistake for him to have gone alone.
jushi.chinese: 他独自前去是一个明显的错误。

jushi.english: His school work was not up to the definite standard.
jushi.chinese: 他的学业成绩没有达到规定的标准。
